name: Relativity
description: Relativity will turn your world upside down. Curved surfaces and stairs allow you to walk from the floor, up the walls and across ceilings, shifting gravity and giving you a whole new perspective! Landscape platforms can be moved and rotated using buttons and wheels to transform the landscape and form bridges.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX980 Ti

reviews.review_text: Took a few minutes to recognize what I was playing and how to play, then I was like...WOW this is cool. The game is a very easy going, challenge puzzle type game. It is challenging and just a nice game to play in VR. I commend the developers for a wonderful thought out game. For the price, this game is a staple for my VR. It is fun to get non-VR people playing it. Please keep up the work on the game. It is on my top 5 list.
